['DescriptionExclusive Links Real Estate has this exclusive Garden Home villa for sale on Palm Jumeirah in the most desirable location onO frond securing the buyer open expansive views and a beautiful Dubai Marina Skyline, enviable by any homeowner. The ground floor provides a modern style kitchen, and large sitting & dining areas which open onto the manicured garden & private swimming pool. All five bedrooms are situated on the first floor, one of which located to the front of the villa with a large balcony and breath-taking sea views and the master bedroom enjoying a luxurious bathroom. A must see property.

descriptions: ["DescriptionONE BROKER GROUP is proud to offer this excellently maintained and hardly used one bedroom apartment right in the heart of Dubai's Opera District, offering views of the Fountains, the Opera House and the Jumeirah coastline.BUA: 830 square feet1.5 bathroomsBalcony from living roomFully fitted kitchenVACANTSOLD FURNISHEDLocated on Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard, a bustling thoroughfare lined with retail outlets and vibrant cafes, the twin Standpoint towers are situated in close proximity to Burj Khalifa, the world\x92s tallest building.Designed by international architects Smallwood, Reynolds, Stewart and Stewart, Standpoint features studios, one, two, and three-bedroom apartments with a wide range of amenities on its podium level.Standpoint provides residents easy access to the varied lifestyle offerings in Downtown Dubai, including The Dubai Mall and Souk Al Bahar, as well as the world-class hotels in the 500-acre neighbourhood.One Broker Group (OBG).ORN: 17196Website: www.obg.ae"]
